Package com.mendeley.api.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthenticationException
    Exception that is thrown when authentication has failed.
    FileDownloadException
    Exception that is thrown when a file fails to download.
    HttpResponseException
    General exception type that is thrown whenever server returns an error code.
    JsonParsingException
    Exception that is thrown when a response from the server could not be parsed to a model object.
    MendeleyException
    Base class for all the exceptions that are generated by the Mendeley API and should be caught by the application.
    NoMorePagesException
    Exception that is thrown when a paged request has already returned the final page.
    NotSignedInException  
    UserCancelledException
